comment: Fun but limited. On Galaxy s22, I can't use effects from other people's videos and there's no effect search button on my app. I was on the beta version and thought that was why I couldn't do it, un-installed it and installed the normal version and I still can't use effects other than the ones I saved while on a previous phone, and some random ones the app offers.
scenarios: On Galaxy S22, the user cannot use effects from other people's videos and there is no effect search button on the app.
The user un-installed the beta version and installed the normal version, but still cannot use effects other than the ones saved on a previous phone and some random ones the app offers.
key sentence: On Galaxy S22, the user cannot use effects from other people's videos and there is no effect search button on the app.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to record and enhance videos, adjust playback speed, add effects, sound, text, music, and post videos.
